pages.title: Kilns
pages.text: After experimenting a bit with alternative furnace concepts, I came up with the idea of making a kiln that can slowly melt materials in bulk all at the same time for relatively low amounts of fuel.

With this device I can achieve the temperature needed to make bronze alloy as well as turning wood into charcoal without burning it up, among other uses.$(br2)I just need to carefully ignite it, and then I can estimate how much time it will take.

$(o)To operate the kiln, place fuel in the bottom slot and a valid material in the top slot, after that, use an igniter on the fuel and let it cook.$(br2)The duration of the recipe displays in the bottom left corner.
